It’s a euphemism for leaving the Democrat Party and rejecting their lies. They’ve been inventing new words and redefining words to scare people for many many years. “Racism” wasn’t a term until the 1930s, and “homophobia” wasn’t a term until the 1960s. These are two words thrown around a lot these days, and they’re brand spanking new in the grand scheme of linguistic history. Of course now that the classic racism isn’t really around anymore, they developed new versions like “systemic racism” to keep the ball rolling. Don’t get me started on the BS that is “white privilege.” Just something to think about. This world is full of lies. Do what you want, but I recommend seeking out different voices about our history in this country. Both establishment Democrats and Republicans are messed up, but the Dems are the worst. They pretend to fight against injustice while they themselves are the biggest perpetrators. Don’t you think it’s weird that Biden doesn’t want anything to do with BLM now that he’s “President Elect”? He showed support just to win votes. These career politicians treat us like we’re puppets to be controlled and manipulated.
You are a conservative American political commentator.
